argument.description: false for forward FFT, true for inverse FFT

argument.name: padding
argument.description: Number of pad elements at the start and end of each dimension

argument.description: Constant value to be used as padding

argument.name: output
argument.description: Output tensor of same type as the input tensor

argument.name: input1
argument.description: Input tensor

argument.name: new_shape
argument.description: List of values, with each element giving the size of the result tensor for the given dimension. At most one dimension may be given as -1 to automatically calculate the dimension size.

argument.name: output
argument.description: Output tensor of same type, size as the input tensor

argument.name: input
argument.description: Input tensor with rank from 1 to 4

argument.name: axis
argument.description: Axis to reverse, in range from 0 to rank(shape)-1

argument.name: output
argument.description: Output tensor. Same shape as input tensor

argument.name: input1
argument.description: Input tensor with rank from 1 to 4

argument.name: start
argument.description: List of integer coordinates, of length equal to the rank of input1. Start coordinate for slicing.

argument.name: size
argument.description: List of integer size values, of length equal to the rank of input1. Size of the input to be used.

argument.name: output
argument.description: Output tensor of same type as the input tensor

argument.name: input1
argument.description: Input tensor with rank from 1 to 4

argument.name: multiplies
argument.description: Number of times to replicate input1 in each dimension

argument.name: output
argument.description: Output tensor of same type, rank as the input tensor

argument.name: input1
argument.description: Input tensor with minimum rank of one.

argument.name: perms
argument.description: List of integers of length equal to the rank of input1. Values must be valid dimensions within shape1, and may not be repeated.

argument.description: Output tensor of same type, rank as the input tensor

argument.name: multiplier
argument.description: Scaling multiplier array

argument.name: scale32
argument.description: if (scale32) mul_t=int32_t else mul_t=int16_t

argument.name: double_round
argument.description: Select double round mode

argument.name: per_channel
argument.description: if (per_channel) NC=shape[rank(shape)-1] else NC=1

argument.description: Constant values

argument.name: input_list
argument.description: List of input tensors

argument.name: condition
argument.description: Input condition as rank-0 tensor

argument.name: then_graph
argument.description: TOSA graph to execute if condition is true

argument.name: else_graph
argument.description: TOSA graph to execute if condition is false

argument.name: output_list
argument.description: List of output tensors

argument.name: input_list
argument.description: List of input tensors

argument.name: cond_graph
argument.description: TOSA graph to evaluate the condition

argument.name: body_graph
argument.description: TOSA graph to execute the loop body

argument.name: output_list
argument.description: List of output tensors
